channel.title: Need help with 2 things
channel.description: Ok. 1. You know items like wizzy g top how do you make them become like "full" if you know what i mean, because the top shows also. 2. How do i change the way i hold a wepon, as in a single wepon, because i want to change many wepons :) Thats all. Thanks Jame5

item.title: Need help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @Jame5 Jame5
item.description:
@Jame5 wrote:

Ok.

  1. You know items like wizzy g top how do you make them become like “full” if you know what i mean, because the top shows also.
  2. How do i change the way i hold a wepon, as in a single wepon, because i want to change many wepons
    Thats all.
    Thanks
